name: getrandom
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool randomizer.
Tool description: Fast and straightforward API to retrieve a random sequence of characters!
API description: Retrieve a random sequence of characters matching the provided query attributes

length.description: The length of the random sequence to generate.

case.description: Specifies the case for the character sequence. Defaults to 'all'.

extra.description:
Allow the use of special characters 

 **true**              @#é$%&ùµ£-_!èçàù?^) 

 **extended**      |"(§{})°¨[*]´`,;./:+=~
